levels.description:
Increases the next heal's healing effect and <$ba.dt.element>Elemental Injury</> recovery to <@ba.vup>{heal_scale:0%}</> and prioritizes the target with the highest <$ba.dt.element>Elemental Injury</> taken
<@ba.rem>Can store up to {cnt} charges</>
